name: Zatar Device Authentication
description: Description: This is the device driver authentication token LWM2M object that Zatar requires for all device drivers.

resourcedefs.name: Zatar Device Authentication Token
resourcedefs.description: A sequence of bytes representing the private identity of the Registered Developer on Zatar. This Token may be reused across many Models/Types, defined by the owning Developer of the Token.

resourcedefs.name: Authentication Status
resourcedefs.description: The status of this token's authentication. The server will write 0 to this resource on authentication failure and 1 to this resource on authentication success.
